title: Good Every Day
overview: He Daye is seen as a "leftover woman" due to her age and her decision focus on her career. She has attempted to walk down the aisle with her boyfriend, Luo Chang but on the day of the ceremony, Luo Chang confessed that he isn't ready for marriage. The two remain close friends who care about each other since then. Han Daye then meets Zhang Meng, a model who faces a stagnation in his career, and Han Daye begins to consider marriage again.
